boardgame.name: Boss Monster: Baue deinen Dungeon!
Boss Monster: Costruisci il tuo dungeon
Boss Monster: gra karciana o budowaniu podziemi
Boss Monster: Le jeu de cartes de création de donjon
Boss Monster: Master of the Dungeon
Boss Monster: The Dungeon Building Card Game
Monstruo Final
boardgame.description: Inspired by a love of classic video games, Boss Monster: The Dungeon Building Card Game pits 2-4 players in a competition to build the ultimate side-scrolling dungeon. Players compete to lure and destroy hapless adventurers, racing to outbid one another to see who can build the most enticing, treasure-filled dungeon. The goal of Boss Monster is to be the first Boss to amass ten Souls, which are gained when a Hero is lured and defeated _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; but a player can lose if his Boss takes five Wounds from Heroes who survive his dungeon._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Playing Boss Monster requires you to juggle two competing priorities: the need to lure Heroes at a faster rate than your opponents, and the need to kill those Heroes before they reach your Boss. Players can build one room per turn, each with its own damage and treasure value. More attractive rooms tend to deal less damage, so a Boss who is too greedy can become inundated with deadly Heroes._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Players interact with each other by building rooms and playing Spells. Because different Heroes seek different treasure types, and rooms are built simultaneously (played face down, then revealed), this means that every _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;build phase_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; is a bidding war. Spells are instant-speed effects that can give players advantages or disrupt opponents._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;As a standalone card game with 155 cards, Boss Monster contains everything that 2-4 players need to play._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: Boss Monster: Master of the Dungeon by Brotherwise Games Legendary Edition For Original Backers (Kickstarter) The Dungeon Building Card Game for 2-4 Players Condition: NEW (never opened; sealed in original shrink wrap!) Includes base game and all extras from the Kickstarter project: * Boss Monster: Master of the Dungeon (the base game) * Boss Monster: Creator Pack -- The Brothers Wise Boss, HELLCOW Boss, Pixel Lincoln Hero Card, T.P.K. Spell * Boss Monster: Epic Multi Heroes -- 2 (Monster Hunter, Trap Monster) * Boss Monster: Power-Up Pack -- 6 Kickstarter-Exclusive Cards (4 Rooms, a spell, and the Demigod Hero) * Boss Monster: Golden Dragon Boss -- Kickstarter-Exclusive card * Four metal LEVEL UP TOKENS * Kickstarter-Exclusive _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Legendary Edition_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; Gold Box sleeve * Set of 9 extra Holofoil Boss cards * Print and Play PDF -- Sent via e-mail to winner (Note: 115MB). * Official Strategy Guide PDF -- Sent via e-mail to winner (Note: 11 MB). * Digital Create-Your-Own-Card Kit -- Sent via e-mail to winner (Note: 200MB). * Soundtrack MP3 -- Sent via e-mail to winner (Note: 15MB). Free shipping to USA includes: * USPS Priority Mail Postage * Delivery Confirmation * INSURANCE * Will ship out the day of or the next day (depending on time) after payment is received. Please let me know if you have any questions!
Everything included from Kickstarter at power up level. When the expansion is sent to me, I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll send it to you. Gold sleeve, coins, everything from Kickstarter campaign included.

Opened, played once, like new. Comes with Kickstarter exclusives: Gold sleeve 4 metal Level Up tokens Golden Dragon, Brothers Wise, Hellcow boss cards Pixel Lincoln, Trap Master, Monster Hunter epic hero cards T.P.K. spell card Shipping to US only, shipping is $5.60, USPS flat rate. Payment accepted via PayPal.
Gold Packaged Kickstarter limited box NIS. Reserved for djdragon001
New in shrink. Gold Kickstarter edition box.
Opened, sleeved and played once. Kickstarter edition. The game wasn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t my cup of tea and I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;d like to break even.

Played only a few times. This is the Legendary Edition for Original Backers. Comes with a gold _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;zelda_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; sleeve, 4 level-up coins, holo versions of all bosses, golden dragon boss card, and six Kickstarter-exclusive cards. This is equivalent to the Power-Up Pack level on the Kickstarter page.

Brotherwise Games (BGM0001) The goal of Boss Monster is to attract and destroy adventurers more quickly than your opponents. As a Boss, you will build your dungeon one Room at a time. Each room has a treasure value to lure in Heroes, and a damage value to destroy them. The Heroes aren_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t too much of a threat, but you run the risk of Wounds if you build a dungeon that_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s all attraction and no bite. With Spells and _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Level Up_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; abilities to spice up the gameplay, Boss Monster has a great balance of fast-paced fun and strategic depth to entertain a table with a range of casual and hardcore gamers.

Played three times. Kickstarter edition (The Extra Life) and expansion Tools of Hero Kind (expansion still in shrink)

Kickstarter copy of Boss Monster with Tools of Hero Kind Expansion (expansion is still shrink wrapped). Base game includes: Gold Box Sleeve 4 Gold Coins The Golden Dragon Exclusive Boss (Kirax) Brothers Wise and Hellcow Exclusive Bosses Pixel Lincoln Exclusive hero The Party Killer Exclusive Spell Monster Hunter and Trap Master Exclusive hybrid heroes Exclusive holofoil copies Exclusive Powerup Pack (Demigod hero, Agent of Evil spell, Shark Tank, Trash Compactor, Ghoul Yard and Liger_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Den rooms) Four additional bosses (Scythe, Jarin, Elicon and Anerak) Special thank-you boss Xyzax (not sure if exclusive or not) This is a whalloping of a game. The shere number of cards included in the kickstarter copy of the game makes it a very much desired collectable. While I do want to keep it as a collectable, I wasn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t a huge fan of the gameplay, so I thought it best to go into someone elses hands. Also, with the second kickstarter coming up in 2014, it would be good to have a copy of the original in case you missed it. Hopefully someone isn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t too put off by my asking price and will enjoy the game more than I did. I will ship anywhere in the UK as part of the asking price, but if someone is asking for Europe shipping or elsewhere, I will have to look into the cost of it and add it onto the total. In case you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re worried about the quality of the cards. I did open the base game and I have played the game once, but the game is still in brand new condition. [EDIT]: It appears that I forgot to add a picture of the ToHK expansion. Message me if you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;d like to see a pic of it in it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s shrinkwrapped glory.

This is the Kickstarter edition of Boss Monster so includes all the stretch goals, also included is a BRAND NEW copy of the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;Tools of Hero Kind_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; expansion which has never been played. Only played a few times, still in very good condition. The game is in English and is complete. Any questions, please drop me a line. PRICE INCLUDES SHIPPING TO MAINLAND UK!!! (anywhere else I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll have to calculate postage).

This is the Legendary Kickstarter edition including the golden box sleeve and all of the Kickstarter-exclusive expansions, plus the Tools of Hero Kind expansion. Everything I got from the Kickstarter is included. Game has been opened but never played. Tools of Hero Kind is still in its original shrink-wrapped _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Gameboy_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; box. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m an avid game collector in a smoke-free home and take good care of my games. Unless otherwise noted above, game is complete with little or no shelf wear or damaged components. High-resolution picture available upon request. Domestic US shipping is $8 for USPS with tracking (insurance is optional if you want to pay for it). Be sure to check my other listings, I usually have multiple games up for sale at any time, and you pay actual shipping cost if you buy multiple games which will usually save you money. I pack my games carefully and have had no complaints or issues. I usually ship the next business day after receipt of payment. Must pay me via PayPal (I will cover the fees). International shipping will be ACTUAL SHIPPING COST. For promo cards this is usually $3-$5. For card games and other small items that can fit into a DVD mailer, this is usually $10-$20. For larger items up to 64oz this is usually $35-$45. For items over 64oz that will fit into a medium flat-rate box (e.g. Agricola or Netrunner sized boxes) the cost is usually $60. Big and heavy items will likely cost $70 or more. Contact me BEFORE ORDERING if you have any questions about shipping.

Brotherwise Games (BGM0001) The goal of Boss Monster is to attract and destroy adventurers more quickly than your opponents. As a Boss, you will build your dungeon one Room at a time. Each room has a treasure value to lure in Heroes, and a damage value to destroy them. The Heroes aren_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t too much of a threat, but you run the risk of Wounds if you build a dungeon that_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s all attraction and no bite. With Spells and _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Level Up_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; abilities to spice up the gameplay, Boss Monster has a great balance of fast-paced fun and strategic depth to entertain a table with a range of casual and hardcore gamers.

Played only once. I am attempting to reduce my game collection size and this game just never made it to the table enough. It is a really fun game, however my game group just never got into it and I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;d rather see it get play time at another game group or household. I take pride in my game collection and take very good care of my games. This game, the rules, and box are in excellent condition. This game does include the expansion: tools of a hero kind, however i did toss like 4 or 5 of the cards because the backs stuck together and damaged those cards... hence I am not reflecting the expansion in the price. Please msg me with questions. Thanks for your interest.
